meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Darryl Campbell Laura Amundson Gabe Gales Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6639.

td.p: Darryl Campbell, a data analyst from Seattle, Washington
Laura Amundson, a former criminal defense attorney from Des Moines, Iowa
Gabe Gales, a research analyst from Cincinnati, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,950)

tr.td: SUMMER FUN
(Alex: Hey, it's that time, isn't it?)
MOVIE TITLE OVERLAPS
SHAKESPEARE--ACT II, SCENE 1
(Alex: You identify the play for us.)
BODY PARTS
GO "C" THE COUNTRY
(Alex: Each country will begin with the letter "C".)
WORDS OF WONDER

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Gabe
Laura
Darryl
AMERICAN LIVES
ISLAND NAMES
GEOLOGY
ADDEND"UM"
(Alex: In [*] you notice the "U-M" in quotation marks at the end of the word. That's because each correct response will end in those two letters.)
COLLEGES WITH MASS. APPEAL
WORDS OF STEVIE WONDER
